title: Someone to Watch Over Me
description: Sabina picks up a man at a taxi rank outside Zagreb train Adrien is badly beaten and in need of help. Adrien is a trans - somewhere in him lies a wire which allows someone else in the world to experience everything that he does. Adrien is looking to hide from the watchers - who in turn want Sabina all to themselves. When Aidrien goes to have the wire removed the watcher makes his move and Sabina isn't quite what Aidrien remembered her to be.
author: Tricia Sullivan
